warthamanaye madapatha sita pinnawala haraha makandanata wati athi margaya sarwodaya wyaparaya samanga sambandha wi sakas karadima sihi katayuththaki.chathura dharmadeshakayeku washayenda, kirthiyata path wu ma himipanan wahanse grantha kipayaka kathuwarayek washayenda, buddha shasana komishame samajikayeku washayenda salpiti koralaye shasanarakshaka balamandalaye pradhana sabhapathi washayen da sewaya kala athara ee sewayata garukirimak washayen saddharma wagishwara shri shilananda yana gaurawa upadhiya sahithawa kolambaa salpiti koralaye pradhana sangha nayaka padawiya 1975 warshayedi malwathu maha wihara parshwayen pirinamana ladi.wisheshayenma unwahansege gunanusmarana pinkama dushkara wiharasthana mulkara genaya.pebarawari 16 ha 17 dedina panampaththuwe kudimbigala aaranyaya senasanaya mul karagena siduwu athara, pebarawari 22,23 dedina shri shailathalarama wiharasthanayeda pinkama pawathwa mema sangha pithruwarayananta pin paminawimata katayuthu sudanam kara thibini.bopitiye dhammissara nahimi rayigam salpitidekoralaye pradhana sanghanayaka ha eksath bhikshu peramune pradhana lekam
enna enna athulata..."
